DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy frontline treatment ovarian cancer participant 70 year age old routine clinical practice Belgium . Bevacizumab use combination carboplatin/paclitaxel follow bevacizumab maintenance accordance Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC ) .
